TopicTitle: How to deploy multiple craft to launch pad ?

Articles.Content:
How do you launch multiple craft from one pad at the same time ?

 

Hi.

I am an old ksp player and I am trying to play an 18 T / 30 Part stock career mode game.

My 1st return probe mun lander involves 5 separate craft and to avoid the "Clear Launch Pad" problem I am currently driving them all to the crawler way.

This is very time consuming and annoying.

I have tried various different google searches but can not seam to find a simple solution.

I have also had a good look in the settings/physics/save files but cant seam to find anything relevant.

So i am also curious now as to where the defining values for the different levels of Pad & VAB are hiding ? (Size, Mass & Part limit values)

It would be nice to upgrade the look of my pad whilst keeping the limits in place.

 

Any mod ideas, setting names or thoughts of any kind would be much appreciated.

Thanks very much.
